CustomField.formula: IF( Owner.FirstName &" "& Owner.LastName = "Andy McCall","Management", IF( CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"CAE"),"Partner", IF(OR(CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"SMB"),CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"SB"),AND(CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"AE1"),NOT(OR(CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"IND"),CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Equip"))),NOT(OR(CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"CNW"),CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Site"))) )),"SMB"&" "&Xactly_Segment_Region__c, IF(AND(OR(CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Fleet IS"),CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"MM")),NOT(OR(CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"IND"),CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Equip"))),NOT(OR(CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"CNW"),CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Site")))),"IS"&" "&Xactly_Segment_Region__c, IF(AND(OR(CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Fleet ENT"),CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Ent"),CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Major")),NOT(OR(CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"IND"),CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Equip"))),NOT(OR(CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"CNW"),CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Site")))), "ENT"&" "&Xactly_Segment_Region__c, IF(OR(CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Equip"),CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"IND")),"Industrial", IF(CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Experimental"),"Experimental", IF(OR(CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"CNW"),CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Site")),"Connected Worker", IF(CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Partner"),"Partner", IF(CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Renewal"),"Renewal", IF(OR(CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Management"),CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"VP"),CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"CS")),"Management","")))))))))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used for Xactly only. Do not use for SFDC reporting. If opportunity owner is Andy McCall, segment defaults to Management.
CustomField.label: Xactly Segment (Sales Role)
